title: What are some good websites for writing whatever I want? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quora is the Answer!! Here other than answering question you can create your own blogs and write whatever you want? Howsoever Long, Howsoever creative with no boundation.Then you can share that content by tagging it to various topics. Option is given on right hand side. In this way you will reach more dedicated audience related to the topic.If you think that your blog is not that popular then you can submit your content to other blogsYou can use Submissions on Various Popular Blogs on QuoraYou can submit your short stories at Mind Boggling StoriesYou can submit your Quotes at Quotables In this way you can use Quora to write whatever you want and categorize them in the whatever way you want.There is no other website which gives you such option. If you want to share your writings with your friends you can share your blog here with them too.
